bug.author: holdenk
bug.summary: kfctl generate fails with `--platform` for GCP, remove `--platform`
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I generated a new gcp platform project and tried to run generate all. It failed with a missing cluster.jinja file.
holden@hkdesktop:$ kfctl init --platform gcp --project boos-demo-projects-are-rad --skip-init-gcp-project preview07gcp holden@hkdesktop:$ cd preview07gcp/ holden@hkdesktop:~/preview07gcp$ kfctl generate all -V INFO[0000] Downloading /home/holden/preview07gcp/app.yaml to /tmp/908216557/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:349" WARN[0000] Defaulting Spec.IpName to preview07gcp-ip. This is deprecated; IpName should be explicitly set in app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:606" WARN[0000] Defaulting Spec.Hostame to preview07gcp.endpoints.boos-demo-projects-are-rad.cloud.goog. This is deprecated; Hostname should be explicitly set in app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:617" WARN[0000] Defaulting Spec.Zone to us-east1-d. This is deprecated; Zone should be explicitly set in app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:627" INFO[0000] Writing stripped KfDef to /home/holden/preview07gcp/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:660" INFO[0000] Downloading /home/holden/preview07gcp/app.yaml to /tmp/208198504/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:349" INFO[0000]
Notice anonymous usage reporting enabled using spartakus To disable it If you have already deployed it run the following commands: cd $(pwd) kubectl -n ${K8S_NAMESPACE} delete deploy -l app=spartakus For more info: https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/other-guides/usage-reporting/
filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:183" INFO[0000] /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow exists; not resyncing filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:455" INFO[0000] /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/manifests exists; not resyncing filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:455" INFO[0000] CreatePipelinePersistentStorage not set defaulting to true filename="gcp/gcp.go:1854" INFO[0000] EnableWorkloadIdentity not set defaulting to false filename="gcp/gcp.go:1859" WARN[0000] Backfilling auth; this is deprecated; Auth should be explicitly set in Gcp plugin filename="gcp/gcp.go:1867" INFO[0000] Adding plugin gcp filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:605" Error: couldn't generate KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Generate failed for gcp: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: could not generate deployment manager configs under gcp_config Error: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: could not copy /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow/kubeflow-kubeflow-63a5a33/deployment/gke/deployment_manager_configs/cluster.jinja to /home/holden/preview07gcp/gcp_config/cluster.jinja using repo local path /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow/kubeflow-kubeflow-63a5a33 Error cannot open input for copying: open /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow/kubeflow-kubeflow-63a5a33/deployment/gke/deployment_manager_configs/cluster.jinja: no such file or directory Usage: kfctl generate [all(=default)|k8s|platform] [flags] Flags: --email string email if '--platform gcp' -h, --help help for generate --hostname string hostname if '--platform gcp' --ipName string ipName if '--platform gcp' --mount-local mount-local if '--platform minikube' -V, --verbose verbose output default is false --zone string zone if '--platform gcp' couldn't generate KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Generate failed for gcp: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: could not generate deployment manager configs under gcp_config Error: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: could not copy /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow/kubeflow-kubeflow-63a5a33/deployment/gke/deployment_manager_configs/cluster.jinja to /home/holden/preview07gcp/gcp_config/cluster.jinja using repo local path /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow/kubeflow-kubeflow-63a5a33 Error cannot open input for copying: open /home/holden/preview07gcp/.cache/kubeflow/kubeflow-kubeflow-63a5a33/deployment/gke/deployment_manager_configs/cluster.jinja: no such file or directory holden@hkdesktop:~/preview07gcp$
What did you expect to happen: Generate a project I can then apply Anything else you would like to add: There are some jinja files, just not where expected.
holden@hkdesktop:~/preview07gcp$ find ./.cache/ |grep jinja ./.cache/manifests/manifests-master/gcp/deployment_manager_configs/storage.jinja.schema ./.cache/manifests/manifests-master/gcp/deployment_manager_configs/cluster.jinja.schema ./.cache/manifests/manifests-master/gcp/deployment_manager_configs/network.jinja ./.cache/manifests/manifests-master/gcp/deployment_manager_configs/storage.jinja ./.cache/manifests/manifests-master/gcp/deployment_manager_configs/cluster.jinja
Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): N/A ( 5ecfa5b ) kfctl version: kfctl 5ecfa5b Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) GCP Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
NAME="Ubuntu" VERSION="18.04.3 LTS (Bionic Beaver)" ID=ubuntu ID_LIKE=debian PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS" VERSION_ID="18.04" HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/" SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/" BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/" PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy" VERSION_CODENAME=bionic UBUNTU_CODENAME=bionic

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
From a conversation on slack with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> it seems like we should delete since it's no longer supported.
The --platform flag should be removed in v0.7.0 and the docs and help should be updated.
